summary:
This MOD add combination equipment for UNP.
You can wear a combination of equipment divided into parts, such as torso and legs and shoulders.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [color=#ffff00] This mod shifted [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29643]Sky Stripper [/url].[/color][/b] 
All clothes are contained in Sky Stripper.
You can overwrite this with Sky Stripper.

combination Vanilla Outfit for UNP - WIP
version 1.0

This MOD add combination equipments for UNP.
You can wear a combination of equipment divided into parts, such as torso and legs and shoulders.
Figure is only compatible with the minimum of the slider.
Other than the skirt texture is using the same as vanilla version.
If you are using the retexture/replace MOD, it may be unexpected in view.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Version History
2012/05/05 ver1.0
add items.
fix weight.
Thieves guild equipments has been subdivided.
2012/04/29 ver0.9
add items.
fix some clipping.
remake some items.

2012/04/14 ver0.8
add items.

2012/03/29 ver0.7
add items.
fix some clipping.

2012/03/26 ver0.65
add items.
fix item slot of Elven Shoulder Pad.
change all items enchantable.
change torso armor upgradeable.

2012/03/23 ver0.6
add items.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Equipments that can be combined

Velvec Outfit - UNP (by anano)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10211

Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP (by Backsteppo)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11767

Osare Underwear - UNP (by anano)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14294

Alexia CatGarter - UNP (by anano)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12421

Osare KneeSocks - UNP (by anano)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13068

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
How to get

All items are contained in the box at the bottom of the desk of a test cell.
The test cell will be able to move with the following command.

coc qasmoke

Please coc command again when you want to go back.

ex:
coc whiterunorigin

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Install

Unzip and drop contents into Skyrim Data folder and activate combinationVanillaOutfit.esp.
Or use the Nexus Mod Manager.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Uninstall

Delete ESP and remove the following folders from your skyrim/data folder.

combinationVanillaOutfit.esp
meshes\\clothes\\hn
textures\\Clothes\\hn

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Special Thanks
anano
Backsteppo
